alert.note: Alert for Meigs; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 2:32PM EST until January 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. In addition, a brief wintry mix is possible Sunday afternoon, with a light glaze of ice possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Ohio and central, northeast and northern West Virginia. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute Monday. In addition, power outages will be possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities will be reduced at times due to the heavy snow. Along higher elevations, winds could gust as high as 35 mph.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
